mapper.sql: p.id AS product_id, p.name AS product_name, p.price AS product_price, p.description AS product_description, p.available AS product_available
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products (name, price, description, available) VALUES (#{name}, #{price}, #{description}, #{available})
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM products p ORDER BY p.id
mapper.update: UPDATE products SET name = #{name}, price = #{price}, description = #{description}, available = #{available} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM products p INNER JOIN menu_products mp ON mp.product_id = p.id WHERE mp.menu_id = #{menuId} ORDER BY p.id

SELECT
FROM products p INNER JOIN menu_products mp ON mp.product_id = p.id INNER JOIN food_spot_menus fsm ON fsm.menu_id = mp.menu_id WHERE fsm.food_spot_id = #{foodSpotId} ORDER BY p.id
